lines.content: Konpeko Konpeko Konpeko! Hololive sankisei Usada Pekora~peko.
Let Pekora handle keeping track all your tasks!
No need to pay for youtube membership!

So as a joke, I went to my friend's house wearing Pekora's
wig and clothes. I could barely stop my laughter as he went as red as a tomato
and looked at me from head to toe with a bit of drool in his mouth.
